page.title: 16Transport Around Gunton
page.content: Trains run daily from Gunton station, 2 miles distant and originally built for visitors to Gunton Hall. There are connections to the Midlands and London at Norwich. Eastern Counties Omnibus Co. runs an hourly service to Norwich and Cromer in summer, but less frequently in the winter. It is heavily subsidised as it is under used. Aldborough Community Bus Company but driven voluntarily carries 16 passengers. It runs twice weekly to north Walsham for shopping. Occasional excursions are arraged to Norwich for shopping and the theatre as the times of the regular company services are inconvenient. Most households own a car which is used for local and supermarket shopping,social outings,holidays and visitings.
